title: Bread machine focaccia
ingredients: ['225ml (8 fl oz) lukewarm water', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 cloves garlic, chopped', '2 sprigs fresh rosemary, stem removed and chopped', '400g (14 oz) bread flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '3 sprigs fresh rosemary, stem removed and chopped']
